trees.panel.style

Enum Orientation

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Orientation>
      • trees.panel.style.Orientation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Orientation>

    public enum Orientation
extends java.lang.Enum<Orientation>
    Possible alignment values for trees.
    Author:
    Marcus Deininger

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      EAST
      (Horizontal) left-to-right orientation of the tree.
      NORTH
      (Vertical) top-down orientation of the tree.
      SOUTH
      (Vertical) bottom-up orientation of the tree.
      WEST
      (Horizontal) right-to-left orientation of the tree.
